trashItem.title: Move to trash
trashItem.message: Are you sure you want to move this item to the trash? You can restore it later.

removeSharedInItem.title: Remove
removeSharedInItem.message: Are you sure you want to remove this item from your shared items? You will no longer be able to see or access it.

removeSharedOutItem.title: Stop sharing
removeSharedOutItem.message: Are you sure you want to stop sharing this item? The user will no longer be able to access it.

deletePermanently.title: Delete permanently
deletePermanently.message: Are you sure you want to delete this item permanently? This action cannot be undone!

trashItems.title: Move to trash
trashItems.message: Are you sure you want to move {{count}} items to the trash? You can restore them later.

deleteItemsPermanently.title: Delete permanently
deleteItemsPermanently.message: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} items permanently? This action cannot be undone!

removeSharedInItems.title: Remove
removeSharedInItems.message: Are you sure you want to remove {{count}} items from your shared items? You will no longer be able to see or access them.

removeSharedOutItems.title: Stop sharing
removeSharedOutItems.message: Are you sure you want to stop sharing {{count} items? The users will no longer be able to access them.

disablePublicLinks.title: Disable public links
disablePublicLinks.message: Are you sure you want to disable public links for {{count}} items? The links will no longer be accessible.

removeOfflineFiles.title: Remove offline files
removeOfflineFiles.message: Are you sure you want to remove {{count}} offline files? They will no longer be available offline.

restore.message: Are you sure you want to restore this version? This will overwrite the current file.

deleteMessage.title: Delete message
deleteMessage.message: Are you sure you want to delete this message? This action cannot be undone!

disableEmbeds.title: Disable embeds
disableEmbeds.message: Are you sure you want to disable embeds for this message? This will remove any embedded content.

leaveChat.title: Leave chat
leaveChat.message: Are you sure you want to leave this chat? You will no longer be able to see or send messages in this chat.

deleteChat.title: Delete chat
deleteChat.message: Are you sure you want to delete this chat? This will remove the chat from your list and you will no longer be able to see or send messages in this chat.

leaveChats.title: Leave chats
leaveChats.message: Are you sure you want to leave {{count}} chats? You will no longer be able to see or send messages in these chats.

deleteChats.title: Delete chats
deleteChats.message: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} chats? This will remove the chats from your list and you will no longer be able to see or send messages in these chats.

remove.title: Remove participant
remove.message: Are you sure you want to remove this participant? They will no longer be able to see or send messages in this chat.

clearThumbnails.message: Clearing the thumbnails will make the app download every visible thumbnail again. Are you sure you want to continue?

clearTrackPlayer.title: Clear track player
clearTrackPlayer.message: Clearing the track player cache removes cached tracks and pictures. This can lead to increased loading times. Are you sure you want to continue?

clearOfflineFiles.title: Clear offline files
clearOfflineFiles.message: Clearing offline files will remove all offline available files. Are you sure you want to continue?
